tool_description:
Get Movies and TV Series and shows data. our API have concrete & big database.  
All Movies , Films & TV Series and Shows metadata, images, posters, background images, TV Series Schedules, actors, cast, directors, trailers, ratings, IMDB ID, Boxoffice movies, Production company and more. Results are in JSON format. we are continuously updating our database records to deliver good service quality.
It will help you build a movie, series, streaming, reviews content site or application easily.
name: Movies Tv Shows Database
title: Movies Tv Shows Database

api_list.name: Get TV Series By Year
api_list.description: return tv series results with title, year, id

api_list.name: Get TV Schedule By Country
api_list.description: return TV Series Name, Season Number, Episode number, Episode name, Air date, air time, runtime, Network, series  id

api_list.name: GET TV Series Episodes by Series ID, Season Number
api_list.description:
A valid TV Series ID (e.g. tt2741602)
return Episode number, episode name, episode air date, vote average, vote count

api_list.name: Get Airing today TV Shows
api_list.description: return tv series results with title, id, year

api_list.name: Get Trending TV Shows
api_list.description: return tv series results with title, id, year

api_list.name: Get TV ON the Air
api_list.description: return tv series results with title, id, year

api_list.name: Get Popular TV Shows By Year
api_list.description: return tv series results with title, id, year

api_list.name: Get Recently Added TV Series By Release Date
api_list.description: return tv series results with title, id, year

api_list.name: Get TV Series Aliases by ID
api_list.description:
A valid TV Series ID (e.g. tt2741602)
return tv series aliases

api_list.name: Get TV Series Images by ID
api_list.description:
A valid TV Series ID (e.g. tt2741602)
return poster, fanart

api_list.name: Get TV Series by Title
api_list.description:
Search by TV Series Title
return title, id, release_date

api_list.name: Get by TV Series by ID
api_list.description:
A valid TV Series ID (e.g. tt2741602)

return title, description, release_date, id, irating, vote_count, meta, popularity, youtube_trailer_key

api_list.description:
Result set includes all search results

Title
Year
Movie  ID

api_list.description:
A valid Movie ID (e.g. tt1375666)
return Title, Description, Year, Release Date, Rated, Runtime, Genre, Directors, Actors, Languages, Country
 Rating, votes, Popularity, id
